original_text: Or he might drop a heavy stone on someone when he had not seen them. If he did not hate the other person, perhaps he did not mean to hurt him.
korean_text: 보지 못하고 사람을 죽일 만한 돌을 던져서 죽였을 때에 이는 악의도 없고 해하려 한 것도 아닌즉

sentences.original_text: Or he might drop a heavy stone on someone
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 그가 누군가에게 무거운 돌을 떨어뜨릴 수도 있고

sentences.original_text: when he had not seen them
If he did not hate the other person
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그가 다른 사람을 미워하지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: perhaps he did not mean to hurt him
sentences.korean_translation: 아마도 그는 그를 해치려고 한 것이 아니었을 것이다
